test-case.description: Should create proper log entries with timestamps

failure.message: Expected 'Core Runner Test Results' to be found in collection === Core Runner Test Results === Test Name: logging-verification Start Time: 06/19/2025 20:17:53 End Time: 06/19/2025 20:17:54 Duration: 706.0276ms Exit Code: 0 Success: True Arguments Used: -NonInteractive -Verbosity detailed === Output === [2025-06-19 20:17:54.512] [SUCCESS] [Initialize-Loggin...] Logging system initialized [2025-06-19 20:17:54.588] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Core runner started [2025-06-19 20:17:54.591] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Loading configuration from: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/core-runner/core_app/default-config.json [2025-06-19 20:17:54.598] [SUCCESS] [core-runner.ps1 ] Starting OpenTofu Lab Automation Core Runner [2025-06-19 20:17:54.601] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Repository root: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation [2025-06-19 20:17:54.603] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Configuration file: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/core-runner/core_app/default-config.json [2025-06-19 20:17:54.605] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Verbosity level: detailed [2025-06-19 20:17:54.613] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Found 38 scripts [2025-06-19 20:17:54.615] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Non-interactive mode: use -Scripts parameter to specify which scripts to run, or -Auto for all scripts [2025-06-19 20:17:54.618] [WARN ] [core-runner.ps1 ] No scripts specified for non-interactive execution [2025-06-19 20:17:54.620] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Consider using -Auto to run all scripts, or -Scripts to specify particular scripts [2025-06-19 20:17:54.623] [SUCCESS] [core-runner.ps1 ] Core runner completed successfully === End of Log === , but it was not found.
